sqlUnit.name: res_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name,t.uri, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.type and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='RESOURCE_TYPE')) as type, t.op_auths, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.state and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='DATA_STATE')) as state from t_n_resource t where 1=1 [ and t.name like '%:name%'] [ and t.state=:state ] [ and t.type=:type] order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: get_user_by_username
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_user t where t.username=:username and t.state='1'

sqlUnit.name: get_user_by_id
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_user t where t.id=:id

sqlUnit.name: get_user_all
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_user

sqlUnit.name: get_user_by_positionid
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_user t where t.position_id in(:positionIds)

sqlUnit.name: user_login_sql
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_user t where t.username=:username and t.password=:password and t.state='1'

sqlUnit.name: user_mlogin_sql
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_user t where t.mobile_no=:username and t.password=:password and t.state='1'

sqlUnit.name: get_users_by_orgid
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_user t where t.state='1' and t.org_id in (:orgIds)

sqlUnit.name: is_user_exist
sqlUnit.sql: select count(*) from t_n_user t where t.username=:username

sqlUnit.name: is_user_in_org
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_user t where t.id=:userId and t.org_id=:orgId

sqlUnit.name: menu_by_role
sqlUnit.sql: from TNMenu t where t.id in (select distinct rm.menuId from TNRoleMenu rm where rm.roleId in(:roleIds)) order by t.sortOrder asc

sqlUnit.name: user_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select u.id,u.username,u.full_name,o.seq_names,u.mobile_no,u.qq,u.email, (select t.name from t_n_position t where t.id=u.position_id) as position, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=u.state and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='DATA_STATE')) as state ,u.create_time from t_n_user u,t_n_org o where u.org_id=o.id [and (u.username like '%:name%' or u.full_name like '%:name%') ] [and u.org_id in(:orgIds) ] [and u.org_id=:orgId] [and u.state=:state ] [and (u.mobile_no like ':info%' or u.email like ':info%') ] order by u.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: batch_change_pwd
sqlUnit.sql: update t_n_user set password=:newPwd where id in(:userIds)

sqlUnit.name: change_pwd
sqlUnit.sql: update t_n_user set password=:newPwd where id=:userId

sqlUnit.name: del_user
sqlUnit.sql: delete from t_n_user where id in (:userIds); delete from t_n_role_user where user_id in(:userIds)

sqlUnit.name: query_menuroleid_by_user
sqlUnit.sql: select distinct t.role_id from ( select ru.role_id from t_n_role_user ru where ru.user_id=:userId union select ro.role_id from t_n_role_org ro where ro.org_id=(select u.org_id from t_n_user u where u.id=:userId) and ro.flag='org' union select rp.role_id from t_n_role_position rp where rp.position_id=(select u.position_id from t_n_user u where u.id=:userId)) t

sqlUnit.name: query_roleid_by_user
sqlUnit.sql: select distinct t.role_id from ( select ru.role_id from t_n_role_user ru where ru.user_id=:userId union select rp.role_id from t_n_role_position rp where rp.position_id=(select u.position_id from t_n_user u where u.id=:userId) union select ro.role_id from t_n_role_org ro where ro.org_id=(select u.org_id from t_n_user u where u.id='140426549285920094') and ro.flag='org') t

sqlUnit.name: query_orgid_by_user
sqlUnit.sql: select distinct t.org_id from (select distinct ro.org_id from t_n_role_org ro where ro.role_id in ( select distinct t.role_id from ( select ru.role_id from t_n_role_user ru where ru.user_id=:userId union select rp.role_id from t_n_role_position rp where rp.position_id=(select u.position_id from t_n_user u where u.id=:userId)) t ) and ro.flag='role' union select u.org_id from t_n_user u where u.id=:userId ) t

sqlUnit.name: menu_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.parent_id,t.sort_order, t.id as menuId,t.name, (select res.name from t_n_resource res where res.id=t.resource_id) as resourceName, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.state and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='DATA_STATE')) as state, t.sort_order as sortOrder,t.icon from t_n_menu t order by t.sort_order asc

sqlUnit.name: valid_menu
sqlUnit.sql: from TNMenu t where t.state='1' order by t.sortOrder asc

sqlUnit.name: del_resource
sqlUnit.sql: delete from t_n_role_resource where resource_id in(:resourceIds); delete from t_n_resource where id in(:resourceIds);

sqlUnit.name: query_menuid_by_resid
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id from t_n_menu t where t.resource_id in(:resourceIds)

sqlUnit.name: del_menu
sqlUnit.sql: delete from t_n_role_menu where menu_id in(:menuIds); delete from t_n_menu where id in(:menuIds);

sqlUnit.name: opauth_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name,t.value,t.create_time from t_n_op_auth t order by create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: opauth_list_by_value
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.value,t.name from t_n_op_auth t where t.value in(:values) order by create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: opauths_by_value
sqlUnit.sql: from TNOPAuth a where a.value in(:values) order by a.sortOrder asc

sqlUnit.name: del_op_auth
sqlUnit.sql: delete from t_n_op_auth where id in(:ids)

sqlUnit.name: dict_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.parent_id,t.sort_order, t.id as dictId,t.busi_name,t.busi_value, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.state and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='DATA_STATE')) as state, t.sort_order as sortOrder from t_n_dict t order by t.sort_order asc

sqlUnit.name: dict_item
sqlUnit.sql: select d.busi_value,d.busi_name from t_n_dict d where d.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value=:busiValue) [and d.busi_name like '%:name%'] and d.state='1' order by d.sort_order asc

sqlUnit.name: dict_item_by_id
sqlUnit.sql: select d.busi_value,d.busi_name from t_n_dict d where d.parent_id=:id [and d.busi_name like '%:name%'] and d.state='1' order by d.sort_order asc

sqlUnit.name: del_role
del_role_menu_by_role_id
sqlUnit.sql: delete from t_n_role_menu where role_id=:roleId

sqlUnit.name: del_role_menu_by_id
sqlUnit.sql: delete from t_n_role_menu where role_id=:roleId and menu_id=:menuId

sqlUnit.name: del_roleres_by_role
sqlUnit.sql: delete from t_n_role_resource where role_id=:roleId

sqlUnit.name: del_org
sqlUnit.sql: delete from t_n_org where id in (:ids)

sqlUnit.name: get_org_by_id
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_org t where t.id=:id

sqlUnit.name: get_org_all
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_org

sqlUnit.name: get_position_by_orgid
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_position t where t.org_id in(:orgIds)

sqlUnit.name: is_position_in_org
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_position t where t.id=:id and t.org_id=:orgId

sqlUnit.name: get_position_by_id
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_position t where t.id=:id

sqlUnit.name: get_position_all
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_position

sqlUnit.name: org_sort_order
sqlUnit.sql: select max(t.sort_order) from t_n_org t where t.parent_id=:parentId and t.type =:type

sqlUnit.name: user_setting_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name,t.uri, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.state and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='DATA_STATE' )) as state ,t.sort_order from t_n_user_set_menu t order by t.sort_order asc

sqlUnit.name: user_setting_valid_menu
sqlUnit.sql: from TNUserSetMenu where state='1' order by sortOrder asc

sqlUnit.name: user_index_layout
sqlUnit.sql: from TNCustomIndex where userId=:userId

sqlUnit.name: min_win_item
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name from t_n_min_window t where t.state='1' [ and t.name like '%:name%'] order by t.sort_order asc

sqlUnit.name: cus_index_minwin
sqlUnit.sql: from TNCusIndexMinWin t where t.cusIndexId =:cusIndexId order by t.sortOrder asc

sqlUnit.name: del_cus_index
sqlUnit.sql: delete from t_n_custom_index where id =:cusIndexId; delete from t_n_cus_index_min_win where cus_index_id =:cusIndexId

sqlUnit.name: del_role_user
sqlUnit.sql: delete from t_n_role_user where role_id=:roleId and user_id in(:id)

sqlUnit.name: check_user_in_role_exits
sqlUnit.sql: select count(*) from t_n_role_user t where t.role_id=:roleId and t.user_id in(:userIds)

sqlUnit.name: del_role_org
sqlUnit.sql: delete from t_n_role_org where role_id=:roleId and org_id in(:id) and flag='role'

sqlUnit.name: check_org_in_role_exits
sqlUnit.sql: select count(*) from t_n_role_org t where t.role_id=:roleId and t.org_id in(:orgIds) and t.flag='role'

sqlUnit.name: del_role_position
sqlUnit.sql: delete from t_n_role_position where role_id=:roleId and position_id in(:id)

sqlUnit.name: del_position_role
sqlUnit.sql: delete from t_n_role_position where position_id=:positionId and role_id in(:id)

sqlUnit.name: check_position_in_role_exits
sqlUnit.sql: select count(*) from t_n_role_position t where t.role_id=:roleId and t.position_id in(:positionIds)

sqlUnit.name: check_role_in_user_exits
sqlUnit.sql: select count(*) from t_n_role_user t where t.user_id=:userId and t.role_id in(:roleIds)

sqlUnit.name: del_user_role
sqlUnit.sql: delete from t_n_role_user where user_id=:userId and role_id in(:id)

sqlUnit.name: del_org_role
sqlUnit.sql: delete from t_n_role_org where org_id=:orgId and role_id in(:id) and flag='org'

sqlUnit.name: check_role_in_org_exits
sqlUnit.sql: select count(*) from t_n_role_org t where t.org_id=:orgId and t.role_id in(:roleIds) and t.flag='org'

sqlUnit.name: check_role_in_position_exits
sqlUnit.sql: select count(*) from t_n_role_position t where t.position_id=:positionId and t.role_id in(:roleIds)

sqlUnit.name: check_role_menu_combin_exist
sqlUnit.sql: select count(*) from t_n_role_menu t where t.role_id=:roleId and t.menu_id=:menuId

sqlUnit.name: roll_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select id,user_name,roll_date,input_date, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.roll_type and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='ROLL_TYPE')) as roll_type, address,flag, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.status and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='REVIEW_STATUS')) as status from t_n_roll t where 1=1 [ and create_time >= :startDate ][ and create_time <= :endDate] order by create_time desc

sqlUnit.name: roll_mgr_list_mine
sqlUnit.sql: select id,user_name,roll_date,input_date, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.roll_type and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='ROLL_TYPE')) as roll_type, address,flag, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.status and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='REVIEW_STATUS')) as status from t_n_roll t where 1=1 and user_name=:username [ and create_time >= :startDate ][ and create_time <= :endDate] order by create_time desc

sqlUnit.name: roll_my_list
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_roll where user_name=:username order by create_time desc limit 4

sqlUnit.name: roll_my_all_list
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_roll where user_name=:username order by create_time desc limit 44

sqlUnit.name: my_roll_list
sqlUnit.sql: select id,user_name,roll_date,input_date, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.roll_type and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='ROLL_TYPE')) as roll_type, address,flag,status from t_n_roll t where user_id=:userid order by create_time desc limit 100

sqlUnit.name: news_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select id,title,resource,url,readcount, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.status and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='REVIEW_STATUS')) as status, create_time from t_n_news t where 1=1 [ and title like '%:title%'] [ and create_time >= :startDate ][ and create_time <= :endDate] order by create_time desc

sqlUnit.name: log_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select id,create_time, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.category and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='LOG_TYPE')) as category, visitee,gender,address,content,objective,assess,nextplan, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.status and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='REVIEW_STATUS')) as status from t_n_log t where 1=1 [ and (visitee like '%:visitee%' or content like '%:content%')] [ and create_time >= :startDate ][ and create_time <= :endDate] order by create_time desc

sqlUnit.name: log_mgr_list_mine
sqlUnit.sql: select id,create_time, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.category and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='LOG_TYPE')) as category, visitee,gender,address,content,objective,assess,nextplan, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.status and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='REVIEW_STATUS')) as status from t_n_log t where 1=1 and user_name=:username [ and (visitee like '%:visitee%' or content like '%:content%')] [ and create_time >= :startDate ][ and create_time <= :endDate] order by create_time desc

sqlUnit.name: log_mgr_list_my_point
sqlUnit.sql: select id,create_time, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.category and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='LOG_TYPE')) as category, visitee,gender,address,content,objective,assess,nextplan, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.status and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='REVIEW_STATUS')) as status from t_n_log t where 1=1 and user_name in (select username from t_n_user where position_id in (select id from t_n_position where org_id in (select id from t_n_org where code like'%:point%'))) [ and (visitee like '%:visitee%' or content like '%:content%')] [ and create_time >= :startDate ][ and create_time <= :endDate] order by create_time desc

sqlUnit.name: log_mgr_list_my_team
sqlUnit.sql: select id,create_time, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.category and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='LOG_TYPE')) as category, visitee,gender,address,content,objective,assess,nextplan, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.status and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='REVIEW_STATUS')) as status from t_n_log t where 1=1 and user_name in (select username from t_n_user where role=:role) [ and (visitee like '%:visitee%' or content like '%:content%')] [ and create_time >= :startDate ][ and create_time <= :endDate] order by create_time desc

sqlUnit.name: log_my_list
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_log where user_name=:username order by create_time desc limit 6

sqlUnit.name: log_my_all_list
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_log where user_name=:username order by create_time desc limit 100

sqlUnit.name: log_query_list
sqlUnit.sql: select id,create_time, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.category and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='LOG_TYPE')) as category, visitee,gender,address,content,objective,assess,nextplan, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.status and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='REVIEW_STATUS')) as status from t_n_log t where (visitee like '%:visitee%' or content like '%:content%') [ and create_time >= :startDate ][ and create_time <= :endDate] order by create_time desc

sqlUnit.name: doc_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select id,title,content,readcount, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.status and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='REVIEW_STATUS')) as status, create_time from t_n_doc t where 1=1 [ and title like '%:title%'] [ and create_time >= :startDate ][ and create_time <= :endDate] order by create_time desc

sqlUnit.name: notice_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select id,title,content,filepath, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.status and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='REVIEW_STATUS')) as status, create_time from t_n_notice t where 1=1 [ and title like '%:title%'] [ and create_time >= :startDate ][ and create_time <= :endDate] order by create_time desc

sqlUnit.name: leave_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select id,user_name,leave_type,input_date,from_date,end_date,reason, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.status and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='REVIEW_STATUS')) as status from t_n_leave t order by create_time desc limit 200

sqlUnit.name: my_leave_list
sqlUnit.sql: select id,user_name,leave_type,input_date,from_date,end_date,reason, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.status and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='REVIEW_STATUS')) as status from t_n_leave t where user_id=:userid order by create_time desc limit 100

sqlUnit.name: get_docreader_by_username
sqlUnit.sql: select * from t_n_doc_reader t where docid=:docid order by create_time desc

sqlUnit.name: docreader_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select display_name,create_time from t_n_doc_reader t where docid=:docid order by create_time desc
